meanings.definition: Having five sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: The playground had a pentagonal sandbox for the children to play in.
meanings.sent2: The pentagonal shape of the building stood out among the other structures.
meanings.sent3: The pentagonal pizza slices made the party more fun and interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her pentagonal personality was as unique and multifaceted as the shape itself.
meanings.sent5: The pentagonal pattern on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A polygon with five sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about a pentagonal in their geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a beautiful pentagonal flower bed in the center.
meanings.sent3: The chef created a pentagonal cake for the special occasion.
meanings.sent4: The pentagonal on the flag represented unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The pentagonal in the artwork symbolized balance and harmony.
